Thief.Name: Thief
Thief.Description: This skill allows you to discreetly steal your opponent's weapon and then use it against him.

FierceBrute.Name: Fierce Brute
FierceBrute.Description: Now you're a real Brute. You're more powerful and violent than ever during fights.

TragicPotion.Name: Tragic Potion
TragicPotion.Description: Have a little sip of this. It could make you a bit drunk. Hic... hic... This peach juice restores some of your energy lost during the fight

Net.Name: Net
Net.Description: A classic net. Not as cool as Spiderman's, but it's good enough for your opponent... Your enemy will be immobilised until you hit him again.

Bomb.Name: Bomb
Bomb.Description: A bit like a water bomb, but far more deadly!

Hammer.Name: Hammer
Hammer.Description: A catching technique which consists of jumping into the air with your opponent, and then falling on top of him.

CryOfTheDamned.Name: Cry of the Damned
CryOfTheDamned.Description: Fierce beasts? Pfffff... You only need to scream and they'll run for their lives!

Hypnosis.Name: Hypnosis
Hypnosis.Description: When it comes to training domestic animals, no one comes close to you. They follow your every beck and call.

FlashFlood.Name: Flash Flood
FlashFlood.Description: Walking around carrying 100 kilos of weapons is very tiring but you have found a clever way of travelling light.

Tamer.Name: Tamer
Tamer.Description: Recycle! Make it part of your everyday cycle! You gobble up all the dead bodies in the arena.

HerculeanStrength.Name: Herculean Strength
HerculeanStrength.Description: You're strong enough to move mountains, but first you must defeat your opponent.

FelineAgility.Name: Feline Agility
FelineAgility.Description: You don't even have a ball of string to play with, but you can always thump an opponent.

LightningBolt.Name: Lightning Bolt
LightningBolt.Description: You strike faster than your shadow and bite harder than your opponents.

Vitality.Name: Vitality
Vitality.Description: Your life expectancy has increased! You'll now be able to fight for longer in the arena.

Immortality.Name: Immortality
Immortality.Description: Your health has increased dramatically! Now it'll be much harder for your opponents to knock you out.

WeaponsMaster.Name: Weapons Master
WeaponsMaster.Description: After having mastered all edged weapons, you're a much bigger threat to your opponents.

MartialArts.Name: Martial Arts
MartialArts.Description: The Chuck Norris course you took has really paid off! Now you can walk wherever you want... and more often than not it'll be all over your opponent's ugly face!

6thSense.Name: 6th Sense
6thSense.Description: Your eagle-eyed vigilance allows you to anticipate when your opponents are sneaking up on you. Now when you attack they won't know what hit them!

Hostility.Name: Hostility
Hostility.Description: You're very polite when you're fighting in the arena. Whenever one of your opponents attacks you, you return the favour......for free!

FistsOfFury.Name: Fists of Fury
FistsOfFury.Description: ... and you scratch, claw, bite, that's just your little way of showing love! You're a mad torrent of misdirected love!

Shield.Name: Shield
Shield.Description: A shield. To stop the blows...well, some of them at least.

Armor.Name: Armor
Armor.Description: What's this? It's a coat of armour. The idea is that you put it on over your t-shirt so that it doesn't get dirty. It also helps to protect you from your opponent's blows.

ToughenedSkin.Name: Toughened Skin
ToughenedSkin.Description: All the knocks you've taken up until now have actually helped you to develop. Your Brute is now much tougher and has a much thicker skin.

Untouchable.Name: Untouchable
Untouchable.Description: You can now avoid attacks much more easily. This is really annoying............but only for your opponents!

Sabotage.Name: Sabotage
Sabotage.Description: Some Brutes choose to vandalise the streets, but you prefer to vandalise your opponents! Each blow will destroy one of your opponent's weapons.

Shock.Name: Shock
Shock.Description: Your attack takes your opponent by surprise and he drops his weapon. Now you can show it off to your friends!

Bodybuilder.Name: Bodybuilder
Bodybuilder.Description: Thanks to your huge biceps you can now use heavy weapons. Bravo Mr Muscle!

Relentless.Name: Relentless
Relentless.Description: When you attack, you're always on target. Nobody can stop you. Most certainly not your opponent!

Survival.Name: Survival
Survival.Description: Years of fighting have made you invincible. Mortal blows have gained you 1 life point instead of knocking you out.

LeadSkeleton.Name: Lead Skeleton
LeadSkeleton.Description: Although it's extremely heavy, a lead skeleton is essential as it considerably reduces blunt weapon damage.

BalletShoes.Name: Ballet Shoes
BalletShoes.Description: You've mastered the swan dance, making it impossible for your opponent to reach you, as long as he hasn't mastered it too!

Determination.Name: Determination
Determination.Description: Nothing can stop you! Each defeat makes you stronger, if one of your blows fails to land, you immediately strike again!

FirstStrike.Name: First Strike
FirstStrike.Description: Your opponents enter the arena slowly, but you prefer to get stuck in straight away! You're always the first to attack!

Resistant.Name: Resistant
Resistant.Description: It takes your opponents endless blows to knock you out. It takes at least 5 blows before you feel anything.

Reconnaissance.Name: Reconnaissance
Reconnaissance.Description: You're prepared to take your time in order to analyse your opponent's weaknesses, but once you start fighting, nothing will stop you.

Counter-Attack.Name: Counter-Attack
Counter-Attack.Description: What's the best form of attack? Defense of course! You'll immediately strike back after blocking your opponent's blow.

IronHead.Name: Iron Head
IronHead.Description: Your opponent will be damaged by his own blows!

Regeneration.Name: Regeneration
Regeneration.Description: Due to your extraordinary ability to heal yourself, you never lose a fight!

Chef.Name: Chef
Chef.Description: All brutes know that the biggest fight is in the canteen, not the arena!

Spy.Name: Spy
Spy.Description: By carrying our some reconnaissance missions before your fight, you’ll avoid long hospital visits.

Saboteur.Name: Saboteur
Saboteur.Description: From foam hammers to plastic swords, you’re fake weapon king! Your opponents won’t notice until it’s too late.

Backup.Name: Backup
Backup.Description: Friendship is all about sharing. Luckily for you, you’ve learnt to share your blows with your opponents so that they can have some too!
